data.text: @TerryStoops The percentage of charters meeting or exceeding expected growth standards has ticked downward every year, from 73.4 percent to 68.7 percent in 2017-2018, the most recent year measured. charters meeting or exceeding growth fell short of the 75% state goal. https://t.co/8AFXM9DtYt
